list_definition.definition: to stop or put an end to

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I have discontinued my visits there
His TV show has been discontinued due to poor viewing figures.

list_ex_of_english: In the experimental conditions, subjects continued maintenance of stimulus information in the second delay interval, while in the control condition retention was discontinued.
